sentences.sContent: They’ve installed the new computer network at last.
sentences.sCn: 他们终于安装了新电脑网络。

sentences.sContent: Security cameras have been installed in the city centre.
sentences.sCn: 在市中心已安装了一些监控摄像机。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + stall(放) → 放进 → 安置， 安装

words.tran: 安装；分期付款；部分；就职
安装；安置（install的ing形式）；正式任命

trans.tranOther: to put a piece of equipment somewhere and connect it so that it is ready to be used
